name: I Found A Moon Rock In My Nose
name_original: I Found A Moon Rock In My Nose
description:
The object of the game is to pick your nose to find ‘moon rocks’. You can pick from either your your left or right nostril at anytime. The more you pick the more points you score! However, don’t pick too much or you will get a nosebleed!

Includes:
PETSCII Nose Graphics and SID Sound Effects!
